ProductInfo.Features:
GW7204C: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. 4CH WD1 Recroding + 4 CH WD1 Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW808H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW7204C DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     4 x GW808H - 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Camera;
1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW12V2A: 12V2A Power Supply for Security Cameras;     1 x GW124CA: 1 to 4 Power Splitter Adapter Cables.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 4CHE6 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 4 x Color SONY CMOS Water Proof 1000 TVL Varifocal Lens Security Camera, Free LED (White/Black)
